title: Node fails with panic (Gnosis, Mainnet)
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 
v2.45.2

OS & Version:
Linux

Commit hash: 
048fe49e4f379829e92116326ed8fcec3c9c8c9a

Chain/Network: 
Gnosis, Mainnet



#### Backtrace

````
panic: no gaps in tx ids are allowed: block 28387486 does jump from 187929377 to 187929409

goroutine 8577 [running]:
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/snapshotsync.DumpTxs.func3.1({0x7ca3f14694e0?, 0xc016052578?, 0x8?}, {0x7ca3f14694e8?, 0x22fb320?, 0xa?})

github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/kv/mdbx.(*MdbxKV).View(0xdf8475800?, {0x2c92978?, 0xc000130020?}, 0xc01cf05400)

github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/kv.BigChunks({0x2c99f78, 0xc0005e04e0}, {0x246e5ff, 0xf}, {0xc016052588, 0x8, 0x8}, 0xc01d6c71e0)

github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/snapshotsync.dumpBlocksRange({_, _}, _, _, {_, _}, {_, _}, _, {0x2c99f78, ...}, ...)
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/snapshotsync/block_snapshots.go:1234 +0xbd1
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/turbo/snapshotsync.DumpBlocks({0x2c92940, 0xc0005b2320}, 0x1b126b8, 0x1b12aa0, 0x7a120, {0xc000ac5f00, 0x19}, {0xc000ac5f20, 0x1e}, 0xb337508, ...)
````
